description:
*** LIMITED OFFER - ENROLL FOR ONLY $39 ***

I am eager to bring you my course about the essential tools for starting your career as freelancer! As this is course is still under development I am happy to offer you a second mover advantage of enrolling for only $39!

Upcoming lectures:

  • Create and manage projects the easy way
  • Never forget or lose sight of your documentation
  • Get a grip in finance: It can be Fun!
  • Creativity and Knowledge Buildup

*** ENROLL NOW ***

I will cover the essential tools you need to know for starting and/or enhancing your freelancer business. You will receive Hands-On experience of me showing you the tools and what essential options you need to be aware of. In my career I had a lot of stressful situations in which the pressure of things to do and information overflow just got out of hands. Over the years I've been developing a unique work-style which combines structural approaches with the best tools available.

Jumpstart Your Freelancer Career With The Proven Essential Toolkit And Hands-On Experience!

I will show how you can become a master of work in the essential fields of:

  • Conquer email management
  • Master personal task management
  • Have fun with project management
  • Find relief in creating financial transparency
  • Spark your Creativity
  • Create a habit of building up knowledge

Find guidance through the wilderness and let me show you what to be aware of, how to structure your work, how to choose the right tools and what tools I am using today. To achieve my goals and get my tasks done.

Beside me talking in person and explanatory screencasts I will provide you with the links to the tools so you can easily follow up and reproduce my steps on your computer.

As always: If you have any questions, please feel free to ask. I am here for you.
title: The essential Freelancer Toolkit: Work smarter. Not harder.
